verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye the LORD <S%H3050><s%>. I will praise <S%H3034><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> with my whole heart <S%H3824><s%>, in the assembly <S%H5475><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%>, and in the congregation <S%H5712><s%>. Praise ye: Heb. Hallelujah
The works <S%H4639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> are great <S%H1419><s%>, sought out <S%H1875><s%> of all them that have pleasure <S%H2656><s%> therein.
His work <S%H6467><s%> is honourable <S%H1935><s%> and glorious <S%H1926><s%>: and his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> endureth <S%H5975><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>.
He hath made <S%H6213><s%> his wonderful works <S%H6381><s%> to be remembered <S%H2143><s%>: the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is gracious <S%H2587><s%> and full of compassion <S%H7349><s%>.
He hath given <S%H5414><s%> meat <S%H2964><s%> unto them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him: he will ever <S%H5769><s%> be mindful <S%H2142><s%> of his covenant <S%H1285><s%>. meat: Heb. prey
He hath shewed <S%H5046><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> the power <S%H3581><s%> of his works <S%H4639><s%>, that he may give <S%H5414><s%> them the heritage <S%H5159><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%>.
The works <S%H4639><s%> of his hands <S%H3027><s%> are verity <S%H571><s%> and judgment <S%H4941><s%>; all his commandments <S%H6490><s%> are sure <S%H539><s%>.
They stand fast <S%H5564><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%> and ever <S%H5769><s%>, and are done <S%H6213><s%> in truth <S%H571><s%> and uprightness <S%H3477><s%>. stand: Heb. are established

He sent <S%H7971><s%> redemption <S%H6304><s%> unto his people <S%H5971><s%>: he hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> his covenant <S%H1285><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>: holy <S%H6918><s%> and reverend <S%H3372><s%> is his name <S%H8034><s%>.

The fear <S%H3374><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of wisdom <S%H2451><s%>: a good <S%H2896><s%> understanding <S%H7922><s%> have all they that do <S%H6213><s%> his commandments: his praise <S%H8416><s%> endureth <S%H5975><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>. a good: or, good success his commandments: Heb. them
